common.welcome: Hello, {first_name}!👋 Ride the wave with us 🌊 — choose an action below and dive into the game! 🚀 You can read the terms of use in the ℹ️ Info section.
common.ban_notification: 🚫 Oops! Looks like you're banned. Reach out to support for assistance.

messages.choose_action: What’s next? 🤔 Choose an option to continue: Today users received: - Regular keys: {keys_today} 🔑 - Premium keys: {premium_keys_today} 🗝️ ❗ Want more perks? Premium keys unlock access to exclusive games, unique deals, and extra bonuses. Lead the way by unlocking new horizons 🏆🚀! 💬 Share the bot with a friend: https://t.me/hamster_keys_xbot (copy the link and share!) 📋 🔥 Select an action below to continue and become part of the gaming elite!
messages.user_stats: 📊 Your Stats: 🏆 Your Level: {achievement_name} — Keep climbing and earn exclusive rewards! Today: 🔑 Regular Keys Used: {keys_today} 🗝️ Premium Keys Used: {premium_keys_today} Total: 🏅 Regular Keys: {keys_total} 🥇 Premium Keys: {premium_keys_total} Your Status: {user_status} — Become an elite player and unlock even more opportunities! 🚀 Earn keys, invite friends, and reach the top together!
messages.settings_intro: ⚙️ Settings Choose an option below to customize the bot to your preferences.
messages.info_description: Hello! Get codes instantly and without any hassle! 📊 My Stats: - Track your achievements. 🎯 - Level up your status! 🚀 - You earn achievements for entering codes. 🏆 📎 My Projects: Unlock new horizons — cool opportunities await you in these projects! 🎗️ 💡 Do you like what I do? Support the project! Send Telegram stars ⭐️ or make a donation to one of the wallets 💸. For more information — /paysupport. All donations go towards the development of the service and new giveaways 🎁. USDT (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz USDT (TRC20): TNoR9woaGGNKGr9ToWCTdYRP2zuB5VoSnH Toncoin (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz 🙏 Thank you for your support! With your help, we will make this service even better! By using this bot, you agree that the bot’s author is not responsible for your actions in games or with currency.📬 Got questions? Contact us: Support 🖊️
messages.referral_links_intro: 🌐 Projects that inspire me! Open for everyone: 💎 Join now and get exclusive bonuses — be one of the first! 🚀 Become part of communities that are changing the game. 💼 Trusted platforms and proven opportunities where I’m already participating, and I hope to earn from them! 🔗 Grab the link and seize your chance right now!
messages.support_project_prompt: 💡 Support the project! To ensure you receive elite keys, we use expensive mobile proxies and a new algorithm that requires much more time and resources. This allows us to provide maximum security and the freshest keys. 💎 Want to help? Your support helps us cover these costs and continue providing quality keys. Just send any amount to one of the wallets below: • USDT (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz • USDT (TRC20): TNoR9woaGGNKGr9ToWCTdYRP2zuB5VoSnH • Toncoin (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz 🙏 Thank you for your support! With your help, we can make the service even better and more reliable!
messages.not_premium_access: 😎 Hey, friend! 😎 We’ve launched a test phase for premium access to elite keys! 🚀 Currently, we’re randomly selecting users to test our system’s speed and stability. This is your chance to be part of this experiment and get keys without any wait time. 🔥 🔒 Our new algorithm and costly mobile proxies provide the maximum security for the keys, but they require more resources. We’re carefully evaluating performance to ensure you get the best experience. 💎 Want to support the project? Your help allows us to further refine the algorithm and guarantee access to the freshest keys. • USDT (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz • USDT (TRC20): TNoR9woaGGNKGr9ToWCTdYRP2zuB5VoSnH • Toncoin (TON): UQBKsWMgDbW-eSON_beitf6P9qFJTtdJfQzZoHjMqdhN5obz 🙏 Support us, and you’ll get a chance to be among the lucky ones 🏖️. Thank you for your help 💫! Questions? Reach out to support 📲!
messages.default_response: 👌 Got it! We’ve received your message. Our super-secret admin squad will reach out to you soon. 🕵️‍♂️⏱
messages.wait_time_with_hours: ⏳ Hold tight! You need to wait {hours} h {minutes} min {sec} sec before trying again.
messages.wait_time_without_hours: ⏳ Hold tight! You need to wait {minutes} min {sec} sec before trying again.
messages.daily_limit_exceeded: 🚧 Whoa, slow down! You’ve hit today’s limit. Come back tomorrow for more fun. 😎
messages.keys_generated_success: 🎉 All set! Here are your keys (tap to copy):
messages.premium_keys_generated_success: 🎉 Thanks for your support! Here are your elite keys (tap to copy):
messages.no_keys_available: 🚫 No keys available for {game} at the moment. 😢

admin.panel_description: 👨‍💼💼 Admin Panel. Time to wield the power! (But shh... keep it secret!)

payment.invalid_donation_input: ⚠️ Please enter a valid number to support us.
payment.donation_success: 🥳 Thank you! Your support helps us improve! 🤗
payment.donation_cancelled: 😔 Payment canceled. We hope for your support in the future!

payment.refund_prompt: To refund ⭐️ use the command /refund_stars with your transaction number.
payment.refund_success: 🎉 Stars successfully refunded! Thanks for your patience!
payment.support_donation_prompt: 💡 Every donation helps us enhance the bot and add new features! 💪 Thank you for your support! Please note that donations are voluntary and non-refundable. If you have any questions, contact us. 📞
payment.refund_transaction_not_found: ❌ Transaction with this number not found. Please check your input!
payment.invalid_donation_amount: ❗️ Please enter an amount between 1 and 2500. Your support matters!

notifications.notification: 🚀 Great news! You might have noticed that we’ve added a new feature — Elite Keys! 🎉 It’s currently in testing mode. Premium access has been given to around 5% of users, selected randomly. What does this mean for you? During the testing phase, those with access to elite keys can use them without waiting! 🔥 Want to join in? We’re continually improving the algorithms and stability, and your support helps us push forward. 💎 Got questions or want to learn how to get access? Reach out to our support team 📲, and we’ll be happy to assist! Stay tuned for updates, as more users will gain access to elite keys soon. Thanks for being with us! 💫
notifications.second_notification: 🚀 Great news! We have new codes for the game — Hide Ball in our bot! 🎉 Get your keys and dive into the game without delays! Elite key holders are guaranteed maximum comfort and security! 🔥 🌍 We've added support for new languages: German, Farsi, Urdu, and Hindi. Your experience is now even more convenient! In addition, your donations help us grow! Learn more about donations and support in the section — 📄 INFO. Don't miss your chance to be part of reliable projects! Check out 📎 My Projects and receive bonuses for participation! 😉 Check your stats and achievements in 📊 My Stats and make sure you're climbing to new heights! 💪 💎 Stay tuned for our news to be the first to access new games! Thank you for being with us! 💫 🤝 Share the bot with a friend: https://t.me/hamster_keys_xbot (copy the link and share!)
notifications.tapswap: TapSwap 🤖 – every tap brings you closer to crypto income! 🎮 Earn TAPS coins by completing simple tasks and receive daily bonuses! The tap-to-earn mechanic allows you to convert every click into rewards. Every tap, every upgrade brings you closer to real profits! 💰 🎁 +2500 shares for the first login – start with a bonus and begin earning right now! 🔥 Airdrop is coming soon – don’t miss your chance to grab your coins first! 🚀 🤖 Click the link and start earning with every click today! ➡️ Other projects can be found below or in the "📎 My Projects" section
notifications.catizen: Catizen 🐈 – hurry to manage the cat city and grab your airdrop! 🐾 Have you dreamed of creating and managing your own cat city? Here’s your chance! Strategic gameplay, daily bonuses, and rewards await you in Catizen 🐈. Build your cat empire and earn cryptocurrency! But the most important thing – the airdrop is about to start! 🚨 Don’t miss your chance to grab your coins! 🎁 Every game brings you closer to big prizes – get ready for the upcoming airdrop! 🔥 Jump on the last train – earn from the airdrop before it’s too late! 🚀 🐈 Click the link and start earning right now! ➡️ Other projects can be found below or in the "📎 My Projects" section
notifications.cityholder: City Holder 🏠 – become both an architect and a magnate! 🏙 In City Holder you can create and develop your virtual city. Your strategy determines success, and in-game coins and $CITY tokens will bring you real rewards after the drop! Build your city, earn, and increase your assets. This is the first Build-to-Earn game in Telegram, where every action brings you closer to profit! 💡 🎁 Receive a starting bonus for registration and build your path to success! 🔥 Airdrop is on the way – don’t miss your chance to grab the bonuses! 🚀 🏠 Click the link and start earning by building your city! ➡️ Other projects can be found below or in the "📎 My Projects" section

Interact with the CEX.IO exchange and earn internal currency with minimal effort! CEXP tokens can later be exchanged for other cryptocurrencies or used on the platform. notifications.cats: Cats 🐈‍⬛ – they’ll leap past Dogs’ success! 😼 Remember the success of Dogs? Then get ready for the next level – Cats 🐈‍⬛! This game is gathering even more fans and bringing in more profit. Manage your cat community, collect points, upgrade avatars, and earn while supporting an animal protection program.
